lead_paragraph: Brazil unfurled a vast canvas celebrating its rainforest and the creative energy of its wildly diverse population in welcoming the world on Friday to the Olympic Games in Rio de Janeiro, all to the pounding beat of samba, bossa nova and funk.

headline.print_headline: Brazil Casts Aside Crisis in Rousing Rio Games Opening
headline.main: Brazil Casts Aside Crisis in Rousing Rio Games Opening
